column1: Specifications: "Remote processing hub for any AI Theta deployment
column2: compatible with any AI Theta Lens and AI Theta Audio."

column1: Features: "(1) video and (1) audio port for connecting a lens and audio module
Supports AI Theta Standard and Professional Lenses
column2: with (1) included cable for connecting a lens

column1: 0.96" color display for device status and configuration
Supports optional AI Theta Audio module for two-way audio
*License plate recognition supported with Long-Distance and Wide-Angle lenses."
"Weight": "UVC-AI-Theta-Hub: 330 g (11.6 oz) UVC-AI-Theta-Hub Mount: 35 g (1.2 oz)"
"Ambient operating temperature": "-20 to 40° C (-4 to 104° F)"
